title: Govt of Sindh trying to encroach KPT land: Ali Zaidi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 14 (APP):Federal Minister for Maritime Affairs Ali Haider Zaidi on Sunday said that under the cover of plantation, the government of Sindh was trying to encroach Karachi Port Trust (KPT) land, despite an order issued by Supreme Court in this regard.
Under the garb of plantation, Gov of Sindh trying to encroach on KPT land, despite an order by Hon Supreme Court.As usual GoS abusing its authority & acting as land grabbers.KPT has sent a legal notice to GoS & initiated contempt proceedings.
— Ali Haider Zaidi (@AliHZaidiPTI) February 14, 2021
In a tweet he said, “As usual GoS abusing its authority & acting as land grabbers”.
“KPT has sent a legal notice to GoS & initiated contempt proceedings”, the minister added.
